title: Pennant International subsidiary wins £7m contract
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Mon, Sep 28, 2015, 08:47 BST - UK Markets close in 7 hrs 43 mins Pennant International subsidiary wins £7m contract By Michele Maatouk | Sharecast – 19 minutes ago 62.7499 -14.7501 
LONDON (ShareCast) - (ShareCast News) - Pennant International (LSE: PEN.L - news ) 's wholly-owned subsidiary, Pennant Training Systems, has been awarded a contract worth in excess of £7m by an unnamed global aerospace and defence contractor which is a new customer for Pennant. AIM-listed Pennant, which supplies integrated logistic support solutions, products and services, said the contract is for the development of computer-based training and electro-mechanical maintenance trainers. 
It (Other OTC: ITGL - news ) includes further options which, if exercised will increase the total value to in excess of £9m over the life of the contract, the company said. 
Chief executive officer Chris Snook said: "This is a milestone contract for Pennant with one of the world's largest aerospace and defence contractors and we very much look forward to working in partnership to jointly deliver a value for money training solution."
